description: This table contains durable medical equipment (DME) member rental tracking record information, such as the member, service, and the amount or number of cycles on the rental so far.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the rental record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the member attached to this rental record.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The vendor attached to this rental record.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure code attached to this rental record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of this rental record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Rental


Maintenance


Capped


Closed

columns.name: TOTAL_CYCLES
columns.description: The total number of cycles so far on this rental record.

columns.name: DME_PRICING_ID
columns.description: The Durable Medical Equipment (DME) Pricing record attached to this rental record.

columns.name: DME_PRICING_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pricing record.

columns.name: TOTAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: The total amount paid so far on this rental record.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created.

columns.name: MAINT_TOTAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: Tracks the total of all maintenance payments made for the rental.

columns.name: MAINT_TOTAL_CYCLES
columns.description: Tracks the number of cycle payments made for the rental during the maintenance period.

columns.name: RENTAL_CLOSE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for closing a rental manually.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: INITIAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: The initial amount specified for the rental on manual rental creation. Prevents this amount from being overwritten during adjudication.

columns.name: INITIAL_CYCLES
columns.description: The initial number of cycles specified for the rental on manual rental creation. Prevents this number from being overwritten during adjudication.

columns.name: INITIAL_MAINT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The initial maintenance amount specified for the rental on manual rental creation. Prevents this amount from being overwritten during adjudication.

columns.name: INITIAL_MAINT_CYCLES
columns.description: The initial number of maintenance cycles specified for the rental on manual rental creation. Prevents this number from being overwritten during adjudication.

columns.name: RENTAL_START_DATE
columns.description: This is the start date for the rental. Rental cycles will be calculated based off of this starting date.

columns.name: MAINT_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date for maintenance on the rental. Maintenance cycles are calculated based on this starting date.
